reviews.title: Fun novelty candle that smells good
reviews.review_text: I purchased several scents of Little Debbie candles in store last year. I was looking forward to buying more this year. Was nervous about purchasing online as I have received shattered candles in the past. They were poorly wrapped for shipping. I purchased 4 different scents this year. They arrived today and I was so pleased with the way they were packaged for shipping. I just had to share this info, as I am sure others have had bad experiences with the way glass items are packed to ship. Each candle is in it's own box that is labeled. This will be ideal if you are not good at wrapping odd shaped items. As I am back a second year, it is obvious I like these candles. I would have bought a strawberry shortcake, but for some reason it is almost twice the price. Some have a stronger scent than others. One of my favs is the cosmic brownie. The label alone is adorable. Just a fun thinking of you gift.
My product shipped in timely manner and also protective packaging. Smells great too for the size and price. It's a good deal

reviews.title: Great price for such a strong scent
reviews.review_text: Anything from Goosecreek Little Debbie collection is amazing. This one was nothing short of great and can only be found at Wal-Mart and not on the Goosecreek website. Usually, they don't sell different scents in the store then they do online, so I was happy to come across this scent.

reviews.title: Not same quality as the GC online brand
reviews.review_text: These do not appear to be the same quality as their candles sold online...within seconds the wicks were sooting not only into the air, but into the candle junking up the appearing wax pool with black debris. I cut off the wicks and put it under my candle lamp, scooped out the destroyed wax, and called it a day. Will buy online at the Goose Creek website from now on.

The smell of the candle is really good and snells like cake. However, I was disappointed when when it arrived in the mail because the top of the candle was broken and tons of glass in the package. I still lit the candle because my autistic son that eats only zebra cakes I wanted to see his reaction.

It is an adorable candle, smells good in the jar but when lit smells super artificial and has an alcohol like chemical smell. I had it lit for almost and hour til I had to put it out. I am very disappointed with this one, the other little Debbie candles that I have tried were so good.

reviews.title: Gingerbread Cookies
reviews.review_text: This is a very light scent. Goose Creek candles are normally very strong but I've had this one lit for over 2 hours and I can barely smell it. It's on a table 2 feet from me. It has a very light gingerbread spice smell to it, but I don't get cookies. Other candles from this company are strong, so I won't purchase this one again. Zebra Cakes and Sweet Banana Bread are both excellent. It's a pretty decorated candle, just not much scent unfortunately.

reviews.title: smell good but bad quality
reviews.review_text: when opening the lid of the candle jar, it smells like you are going to eat a jummy cake roll. You would think that your house would smell like you are baking. Well, the wax melted perfectly even, but you could hardly smell it. i had to burn other candles, it was a total disappointed. Burn Yankee Candles or Bath and Body works, you cant trust this brand.

reviews.title: Unfortunate shipping and packaging
reviews.review_text: I ordered 3 candles and when they arrived the box was just full of broken glass and I could not reach in to even check the candles. They were not wrapped in any protection, just 3 candles thrown in a big box. But Walmart did refund me when I reached out.

reviews.title: Great Candle Damaged During Shipping
reviews.review_text: So if shipping on Walmarts end had been better, this candle would have been the perfect gift. There's nothing wrong with the candle itself, and it smelled amazing just exactly like the cakes! But the candle itself shattered during shipping, which is why I was a bit hesitant on ordering through Walmart, but thought I'd take a chance. Walmart did issue a refund which they're always great about when things go wrong. Save your time and money and order directly from Goose Creek Candles website!! I definitely am!
I missed getting this last year. I was so excited to find it at a very reasonable price. Merry Christmas to me! Thank you Walmart.

reviews.title: Bad Burning
reviews.review_text: This candle smells exactly like oatmeal cream pies when you open the jar. When it's burning, though, it smelle awful. I thought it might give off a vanilla smell, but its more of a strong chemical.

reviews.title: The Perfect Candles
reviews.review_text: All of the Little Debbie candles have been wonderful! The outside design is so nostalgic and cute! The smell is perfect! So much better than expected! I wish I had bought more! They made such fun gifts!

reviews.title: Broken!!!
reviews.review_text: Item arrived just exactly how everyone else in the comments are saying damaged and the glass broken ! My daughter was so bummed since she loves these brownies

First, ordered twice and the glass was broke when I got it. They didn't wrap it to send it. Second the candle burnt all the way down in 30 min., literally just disappeared, smelled good but not worth the money

reviews.title: Gingerbread %231
reviews.review_text: This is wonderful. I'm so happy with this purchase. The scent is amazing. I've ordered several of these in different Christmas scents and the gingerbread can't be beat.
The smell was surprisingly true to the little Debbie Honey buns I even bought a package of the honey buns and are getting them with the candle as a white elephant gift. My family loves little Debbie.

reviews.title: Buttercream Bliss
reviews.review_text: I have had other candles that are similar to this one, and they are some of my favorite scents as far as candles go. It smells like a vanilla cake with buttercream. I love it! Perfect for the holidays.

reviews.title: I love this Candle
reviews.review_text: I loved this item so much that I tried to buy 3-4 more. Unfortunately the supply was all purchased and then reposted for sale by ‚Äúvendors‚Äù for triple the price ‚Ä¶ Basically ticket scalpers have now ventured into groceries and basic home products
Wasnt able to use as it arrived damaged. Package did not indicate it was glass and im sure it was tossed around. so grateful no one was injured with the glass when opened Package
Very cute candle by Goose Creek, although it smells very good it's not much to the gingerbread side, but a nice sweeter cookie smell. Cute packaging too!

reviews.title: Not worth your miney
reviews.review_text: These candles LOOK great, but it seems like most of the money goes into the design and not the scent. Cheaper candles (like Great Value candles) smell much better.

reviews.title: Smells so good!
reviews.review_text: I have almost all of the Little Debbie candle collection. Smells just like the sweet oatmeal pie. Great value and quality with Goose Creek candles. Can't go wrong with them!

The candle smells delicious I'm so glad I bought this candle for Christmas gift.The front of candle is so cute with Santa. And little Debbie logo. My house is going to smell so good Christmas morning while opening gifts.

reviews.title: wow
reviews.review_text: haven't lit it yet but my first impression is the beauty of the candle jar! i got the cosmic brownies one as that's my favorite from little Debbie. without lighting it, it already smells so good!! Definitely will purchase other scents.

reviews.title: True to smell!
reviews.review_text: Smells exactly like a Christmas tree cake! My kids and I love Christmas tree cakes and can't wait to light this candle up closet to Christmas! Delicious cake and frosting. This will be a good one for the kitchen.

reviews.title: Smells so good!
reviews.review_text: I put this candle under my warmer this morning. Within 2 hours I did a grocery order and ordered 4 boxes of Little Debbie's. ü´£ I guess the marketing worked, because this candle smells so yummy! üòÜüòÜ

reviews.title: Beware!
reviews.review_text: I wouldn't buy this unless you plan to buy in store. After waiting longer than expected for delivery it came shattered. I can also smell the candle since it's all open. Doesn't smell like oatmeal cr√®me pie. Smells more like a knock off hot toddy candle from candleberry. Just my opinion. Doesn't smell bad but not what I expected. However, the damage is massive so I can't even gift it to the oatmeal cr√®me pie addict I work with. Very sad over this purchase.

reviews.title: smells amazing
reviews.review_text: these candles smell so good. scent just the right strength. burns evenly and well. nice lasting candle and the best smelling. 10/10 recommend
The candle I bought arrived with multiple cracks in the jar. It's not safe to use like this . Very disappointing experience.

reviews.title: you still owe me money
reviews.review_text: i ordered two only received one broken one returned it and got credit but never received credit for second item

reviews.title: smells amazing
reviews.review_text: love this candle. smells so good. just the right throw. candle burns well. great value. 10/10 recommend this candle

I rated this product this way because it was a better product than I expected. The quality exceeded my initial thoughts, and the performance was outstanding. I especially appreciated the attention to detail in its design. Moreover, it proved to be very user-friendly and efficient in its function. Overall, I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable option.
"Never received showed ""in-stock"" but never was still til this day does but is not"
They are great!!! love this candle. Smells amazingly!
Chose not to review this product and the rating should be disregarded because it was a substitution, although the candle is nice.

reviews.title: Shipping problems
reviews.review_text: Two different orders were shipped. Both orders, the candles were busted so we never got to experience the smell, texture etc‚Ä¶

My Sister Loved the Candle. Gave it to her as a just because gift. She said it smells really good. It put a smile on her face when she received it.

reviews.title: Not affordable when it burns down fast

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: It makes the whole house smell yummy. You can even still smell it after you've burnt it for the day.

reviews.title: Smells amazing!!

reviews.title: Great Candles
reviews.review_text: Goose Creek Candles are one of the best. I'm happy that I can find them at Walmart now at such good prices.
took too long to receive such a small package. Does pack a punch as the sweet smell lingered for hours / days
this was pricey, but it smells fantastic. it came smashed and all broken. instead of returning it, we carefully removed the broken glass and used it in a wax melter.

This smells exactly like a honey bun. i cant get enough of these little debbie candles.

Love the smell! Smells like baking in the entire home! A little pricey though

LOVE the candles!! Hate the mishandling of the packages and customer service of Walmart. I ordered 2 of these candles. They came on time however both jars were SHATTERED!!! Contacted customer service and was told there is nothing that can be done; try going into the store‚Ä¶ the reason I ordered them online is because they never are in stock at the local Walmarts in my area.

reviews.title: House smells like a bakery
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this to anyone and I am looking to trying out all the scents they have to offer. First let me start with the quality of the packaging it's super cute and festive and definitely nostalgic but the smell is what got me speechless this candle made the whole half of my house smell like someone was baking cakes. This candle is worth the price you won't regret buying this I will definitely be buying more.
